website_summaries.verdict: Good battery life and Bluetooth connection range make this a really nice choice among portable speakers.
pros: of battery life per charge, which is above-average performance
Should give you roughly 100 ft. of Bluetooth range
If you use Alexa, you can control this speaker through voice commands
Speaker offered in multiple colors so you can find your favorite
Waterproof and floats if dropped in the pool
cons: Rechargeable battery loses capacity after a few months

customer_reviews.title: I read a ton of reviews about ultimate ears and this speaker hasnt disappointed me at all
customer_reviews.text: Ive had jbl speakers for years. I was looking into getting a updated bluetooth speaker. I read a ton of reviews about ultimate ears and this speaker hasnt disappointed me at all. It's great sound.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: - Waterproof - Sounds OK - Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Plus: - Waterproof - Sounds OK - Easy to set up. Minus: - For whatever reason, when I play one playlist, and then switch to another playlist, I lose the connection and it starts to play from my phone. I have to fiddle with the volume buttons on the UE2 to get it to play out of the speaker again. Very annoying. - The sound effects are REALLY annoying. As noted, I have to fiddle with the volume buttons to get it to play from the UE2 every now and then, and the BONG sound effect is insanely obnoxious. Thankfully, you can turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: owen_meany

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Terrible battery life. Fully charged lasted like an hour. I traded this for the Fugoo XL and have loved that one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched plenty before buying this speaker. My husband is a letter carrier and uses speakers all day long listening to his music/sports. I've bought him many in the past several years and they always give out too soon. Can't attest to longevity for this product, and it did cost more than the lessor quality speakers I purchased in the past, but he is thrilled with the difference in sound. No comparison he says. Sorry, can't get technical with my review, but I can tell you that it's easy to use, easy to transport, (I also purchased a crushproof case to protect), and sounds incredible. The battery charge lasts a lot longer too. Can't help but recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: HoneyB

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: All I dislike is the start up instructions. Example, the first thing it shows is how to replace the battery. Thinking there is no battery I find out there is. There only 3 instructions to pair it with a phone, if you follow them you get an error. After much time thinking I was doing something wrong found out I had to leave out the second instruction out then it worked. Oh it said nothing about charging for 2-3 hours before you try to pair or that you have to download an app. The instructions were unprofessional for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bsacc

customer_reviews.title: Boom Boom POW!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers! The sound quality and bass is amazing! That 360 sound is what makes these little bad tubes pump! I love hanging mine on the ceiling from a hook. I also love sitting it in my bikes water bottle holder, it is a perfect fit! So I can ride out and jam to my tunes. I just received my "Deep Radiance" limited edition. It is absolutely gorgeous! I love all the vibrant colours. Totally worth getting your hands on one if you have not already! Water proof,Shock proof.....and Bad a** sound!
customer_reviews.author: RetroWave

customer_reviews.title: This speaker has a lot of great qualities and features
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has a lot of great qualities and features. However, our use it sparingly because the conga drum sounds it makes when it turns on and off and connects to Bluetooth is extremely loud and startles me every time! Also, I prefer the JBL speakers because they’re smaller and easier to carry around and the sound is much warmer and pleasing to my ear.
customer_reviews.author: New Cake Baker

customer_reviews.title: We love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: We love this speaker. The sound is great and it keeps its charge for a couple of months. We love to stream Amazon music on it. It syncs great with my iPhone. I was even able to stream music for my son while I was in the basement and the speaker was upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but sinks like a rock -- Be careful if using in a lake or ocean and drinking
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Great sound, seriously waterproof - love it! Con: If you drop this in a body of water it will sink like a rock. This might not be an issue for most but picture yourself relaxing in a chair floatie on the lake listening to your favorite tunes. Now add a couple of beers and some waves from a nearby boat and poof the speaker falls into the water. Once it's submerged fully the music stops - you can say good bye to your speaker because it just joined Davey Jone's locker.
customer_reviews.author: Chipper

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker ever
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift 2 years ago and it has been fabulous. I just bought 4 more for my adult kids and they are thrilled. You can connect 2 to create a stereo sound. You can string together up to 150 of them, 30 feet apart, so you could literally ring a football field. Great for backyard parties, around the house, for work (I teach music). It's small size makes it very portable. It also has great volume -- better than most other small speakers. I'm picky about sound quality and this passes my tests-doesn't buzz, has good balance. Great speaker!
customer_reviews.author: SingerMom

customer_reviews.title: Get a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This is a extremely old review as i am just now writing this, i got this speaker and it worked amazingly, for maybe 3 months and thats stretching it. I was using it in my truck just listining to music at most 30% volume when everything became crackly, the dam speaker blew withing a few months of owning it. If i could go back and buy another it would be any other brand except Ultimate Ears, just pitiful
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Worth the purchase for sure! These speakers are the perfect size to travel with to anywhere! The fact that the sound comes out almost from every part of the device makes it sound amazing. You can LITERALLY hear your music playing in 360. The large volume buttons also are very convenient. +Looks chic +Sound is amazing, almost 3-D +Won't bust your wallet. +Very simple machine, very easy to connect to devices, no hassle no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Family

customer_reviews.title: Bass rattly and terrible within a year (with minor use). Bluetooth consistently sketchy.
customer_reviews.text: Mainly I want to warn people not to expect this to be good for more than a year. I can't imagine I use this speaker more than most people — rare to every so often — and yet the internal speaker grew bad quickly and has only continued to get worse. It's to the point I can't even listen to music that has low end without being loud (loud music masks the rattling). The speaker rattle and fuzz borders on unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Slain

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound + Fast to Connect
customer_reviews.text: The UE Boom 2 puts out more realistic sound than our Bose Soundlink II, which was and unexpected yet welcome surprise. Connecting via Bluetooth to it from our iPhones is also faster than any other device we access from iPhones. For Battery Life to get a 5 star rating the battery would never run out, but this lasts the entire evening for us at medium volume. So far, this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalDave

customer_reviews.title: Sounds soooo good. I use this as the main speaker in ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds soooo good. I use this as the main speaker in my house, outside in the yard, and outdoors when camping/rafting/canoeing/shooting. Sounds great at any volume level, but obviously a little distortion at the highest volume levels. However, if you're outside and a hundred yards away, it sounds fine. Even at that volume level and distance away all sounds are clear and distinct: drums, bass, guitar, keys, voices, etc. Friends heard mine and trashed their current ones (JBL and Bose) and got this one. Now we can block party and connect three of them when we are together. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't even charge it.
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed. Well, biggest problem was it was used. Not just everyday used but banged and beat up like it was used in a football game. Had a jacked-up, broken charger port. Fake charger cord. Didn't even deserve one star. They must have dug it out of somebody's trash. I usually don't throw shade on a company but this was really bad. I cannot comment on the connectivity, the battery, or the sound...never got that far.
customer_reviews.author: Kat in OH

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SPEAKER!! MUST CONSIDER!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SPEAKER!!!! It definitely rivals similar size Bose speakers for half the price!! If you are in the market for a portable Bluetooth speaker, I highly recommend this one from UE! Also, with the free app you can download, you can connect up to 4 of these speakers together for a truly immersive sound experience! They have a mounting female end threaded screw attachment on the bottom that can be used to mount them on a stand for stability. Awesome to link 4 of these together and then use a flexible clamp mount onto my deck for cookouts or time around the firepit!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. Poor Battery Life. Shady software updates
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good. The battery life is pretty terrible after a year or so. Logitech made "Remote Power On/Off" a default setting with a firmware update. That means the device is constantly on and listening for Bluetooth LE (Low Energy) signals so you can turn the speaker on/off from your phone. This means the speaker battery is dead when you need it. This was an optional setting previously, but logitech made it the default. It ruins the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for close to 2 years now and it works as it should, but I've never been impressed with the quality of sound. It's ok, but not great and definitely not HiFi. the bluetooth control software is junk and should be rewritten by a professional software technician. There's better speakers out there, I know they cost more, but ya get what ya pay for. I would not recommend this speaker to a friend because of sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: FastEddy

customer_reviews.title: Battery charge stinks
customer_reviews.text: I received this speaker in November, I barely used it until the end of March, the sound quality is fabulous however it is now June 1st and after 3 months of using it (and not constantly) it doesnt stay charged for longer than an hour. It also takes about a full day to even charge at all. I have tried replacing the charger and everything. If it would charge while using it I would even be happy. Needless to say I am going to have to buy a new one which is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: maria fazio

customer_reviews.title: Battery becomes useless quickly
customer_reviews.text: Had thus for a year and used it less than 20 times. Great sound and good recharge. However, the battery dies and doesn't allow to recharge (for me) after such a short time. No replacement battery and I was told that the whole unit becomes useless from Best buy. Rip off speaker! So I just bought a $20 throw away other brand. Never will I waste money on something that uses cheap, batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Airplane

customer_reviews.title: A few problems
customer_reviews.text: I do not care for the design. The volume controls are difficult to operate, as you have to search for that sweet spot before it responds. I also do not like the charging set up. I have to fiddle around with it to get the cord seated and charging. The fit is not seamless so I tried to tape the charging cord on permanently. Because I think the receiver part inside the speaker is becoming damaged from me trying to connect to cord to it. The sound is good for music, but for speaking as in news and podcasts, not as great. I had the old rectangular UE, and for me it worked a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rail

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 mm jack and charging usb are on the bottom poor placement for wired use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a great speaker but not for me. As soon as I opened the box I could see this speaker would not work. I wanted to use it with a non Amazon Alexa device without bluetooth. The the headphone and power jacks are on the bottom. That means to use it as I wanted I'd need to either stand the device on its top with the wires sticking out or lay it on its side. I never actually tried the speaker. I returned the speaker the same day. My fault really....
customer_reviews.author: bturrie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. I got the deep radiance color which is perfect since all of my friends seem to have the same speaker but in different colors. There are so many pros to this speaker its hard to say them all but I will list my favorites below. :) Pros: Waterproof Shockproof (Yes we've dropped these, probably to many times and they still work) Color is adorable You can sync them all together (We've done 15 of them at the beach and could have done more) Sound Quality Size is perfect - fits in my bag Cons: Expensive - but you do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: MeganFromLV

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good for a single speaker and fills the room nicely indoors. Good for a kitchen or other situation where you don't want a permanent set up. Outdoors it's not what I'd want for hosting a big party, but for sitting out by the fire pit and listening to some music without annoying the neighbors it's great. Connecting to it is easy, just your normal bluetooth config which took no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Battery BLOWS! KEEP LOOKING.
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep sweet and short. This thing sounds good, bass is deep for it's size with Clean sounds.. Even has an app to help you set your saved custom settings. But, the battery life on this is terrible. I play at full volume and it lasts about 3 to 4 hours. Terrible! And I can't listen while charging either. Who engineered this crap? I'm so sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my mom she really wanted the megabooM. This is pretty loud for her. She loves taking it outside and listening to her YouTube videos. Sound quality is the best I had brought a speaker by one of the better known brands it stop working within a year never again. Will I buy that brand again I’ve had the mega boom and wonderboom speakers for two or more years now . Love them both.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Save your money to buy this, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 Miccus speakers die on me, should've bought this one. I really didn't think that the sound would be that much better but I was really wrong with that logic. I run this speaker at parties, my golf cart, by the hot tub, in a crowd at a BBQ cook-off, etc. I hate to admit, it's easier to hook this speaker up to my cell and run Pandora than it is to turn on the stereo, ... and it's great poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Rupe

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for a couple of days, but so far it's proven itself to be a powerful speaker with very good sound. The Bluetooth connectivity with my ipod touch 7 is outrageously good! I work outdoors and keep the ipod in my pocket. I had to move a good distance away from the speaker - 50 yards or so - a few times and never lost the connection. And the sound carries far in all directions. I bought this after working a couple of days with someone who also owns one, and he can't say enough good things about his, either. Great product, fast shipping....and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Four Sticks

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift. It has a very good sound for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift. It has a very good sound for its size. It was a Christmas gift for a friend. He is taking it everywhere. I also purchased the carry case for the little speaker. So when we are working we get to listen to our favorite tunes.. I love how compact it is.. It is smaller than i expected. But did not affect the sound.. Wish there was a way to adjust or add more bass. But still not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker but could do a little better in the low bass end but other then that it's a really great speaker for the price Update: 2 of the 3 speakers are somewhat messing up or something wrong with my phone it keeps cutting out and always have trouble with audio always have to pause the song or video. But for the price it should work like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Steven hood

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Good sound it gets pretty loud. Good for small gatherings and has good durability and portability. Easy to connect to Bluetooth, my pain problem is if you go from let’s say YouTube to music the transition isn’t good and don’t play in whatever application you go to second. You may also experience Bluetooth problems if you’re by someone who was connected to the Bluetooth previously.
customer_reviews.author: David Price

customer_reviews.title: Great features and  big sound.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker speaks volumes. I actually bought this one and the Bose micro to compare for myself after reading a lot of reviews. I returned the Bose. The UE is louder from a distance which I need when I leave it on the boat to go swimming. And the UE has an app with an equalizer which I love. Bose might have sounded 1% better on the bass but the UE was just better all around. Highly recommend this little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Completely waterproof and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: The form factor of this speaker isn’t much different from a can of monster and it constantly impressed me with the sound quality. It’s completely waterproof and super durable. I took it to the beach and it got some sand in the mesh and I simply rinsed it off afterwards. It really shines when playing acoustic music. The bass is good but gets lost a little when it gets real low. Other than that this speaker just keep impressing me with its form factor and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you need it for your phone for music. Do not buy to enhance the volume on laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my laptop and presentations. It works great for your phone if you want to play music but when you open up your laptop either via the wire or through Bluetooth the volume is minimal at best. If fact the It is only slightly better than the laptop speakers. Only buy this if you need it for your phone for music. Do not buy to enhance the volume on laptop
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S

customer_reviews.title: This is the Bluetooth speaker you want - don't waste the cash on the Bose
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical that this little thing could be the best rated portable bluetooth speaker, but this bad boy bumps. Super easy to setup and use and it's the perfect size to fit in my water bottle holder on my bike (I won't wear headphones when I bike, but I'll certainly use speakers). Compact design, very rugged - accidentally already tested its water resistance by leaving it out overnight in the rain. Great buy, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: slicknate

customer_reviews.title: One of the best speaker I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best speaker I've ever used! We had zero issues with it and has performed beyond my expectations! I having been researching and checking prices of this specific speaker for over a year. My family and I are always playing music throughout our house...living room, kitchen, bathrooms, bed rooms, garage and yard. So picking a reliable and a high performing speaker was needed. The battery lasts forever and the quality/volume is pretty good. We loved this speaker so much we decided to buy another that stays on our 2nd floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound from a small device.
customer_reviews.text: The sound that comes from this device is loud and full. Meaning the lows and highs are there equal making it much more enjoyable to listen to your tunes . Nothing I like less then listening to a tune I know very well and hearing just the bass or just a tinny sound. Don't misunderstand , this does not mean this is anyway high fidelity. It wont match your car stereo or home system but it will give you quality sound in a big way.
customer_reviews.author: Tomd

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: This thing's sound quality is amazing. I hardly need to put the volume a quarter of the way up and it's already super loud. If you need something small and simple that gets the job done then get this speaker. I can't really say much more about it except that it rocks. Totally worth the $99 investment for this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: GetFit NoExcuses

customer_reviews.title: Good Charge Life and Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best wireless bluetooth speaker I have had for the price. So far, about 2 months, it has worked great! The battery life is great as I have yet to charge the speaker, we only use while outdoors or camping. And, it sounds great. This speaker makes a great camping speaker because your neighbors can't hear it, or barely can depending on how loud you have it. I am very hopeful that this speaker will last a few years, unlike other speakers we have used that stop holding a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The sound, wireless and goes up loud.
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! Absolutely love our new BOOM 2, it is small, lightweight and it goes as loud as we want it to!! We use it outside while working on the yard and yesterday took it to the lake to play music for everybody and it was amazing. The sound is amazing is the music is not distorted when turned up at all. Can't wait to take it on the boat with us too!! You will absolutely love this awesome wireless boom. Also, the charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MJROD

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I heard a friends Mega Boom (same, but larger) and was really impressed. Easy, and all-around sound which was quite impressive for a small, easy to use package. If color is unimportant, check all of them as the price varied wildly when I purchased this. As I recall, some colors were almost 50% more expensive based on supply/demand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love it! This is my second wireless speaker I've bought and the quality is Definitely worth the price! A family member has the original boom, they never complained about it so I decided to look into getting one for myself. The sound quality and bass to BOOM 2 is extremely smooth. I have no problem connecting it to other devices. If you're I the market to get a wireless speaker, BOOM 2 will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good portable option
customer_reviews.text: Good portable option. I have a tdk wireless as well and has good sound about an 8.5 of 10 for a Bluetooth speaker and good base and overall depth of sound. The battery on that has had issues and been limited like less than 3 hours. The benefits of the BOOM are better battery and more durable. A tradeoff but it serves as a good camping option to have tunes and not be worried about battery or exposure to elements.
customer_reviews.author: andrew h

customer_reviews.title: There’s a reason, some are sold as refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: A guy I work with has one, it sounds great so I bought one. Mine was bad right out of the box. At half volume there was a buzz internally. Sounded like the speaker was blown. Be aware when you see items for sale, and look two lines down and see the same item as “factory refurbished” Mine was new, but now in the refurbished pile.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great item but had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after the identical one we have had for six years died. We loved it and used it on a daily basis. It produced spectacular sound and was easy to operate. Never had a problem with it. As soon as I took the new one out of the box and got it set up it was trouble. It intermittently went off for no reason. Sometimes it would eventually come back on and other times had to be rebooted. In addition, the charge did not hold long. I had to send it back, and there was no replacement available from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lydia

customer_reviews.title: 15 hours, I wish!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing would be great if I could more than 4 hours out of it. This is my second unit with the same issue. Apparently in order to get anywhere close to 15 hours you have to have the volume on a low setting which is great if you're listening to it in a library, however that is not how I spend my days. UPDATE: to make things even worse, it drains faster than be charged. Will be sending this back
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for my application
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these and so far they work and sound great. They are not used daily so I only recharge and use them 5 to 15 times a year. I have seen some complaints about them not holding a charge and I suspect that problem may come from a higher level of usage and the associated higher number of recharge cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Trebor

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Loud but won’t play stereo music properly
customer_reviews.text: No way to select mono play of a stereo recording, so you only hear the left track. Really annoying especially when listening to symphonies or theatrical music and or sound effects. I’ve tried using the mono settings on my iPhone and it doesn’t help. I like it for the convenience, but will never buy another product from them again until they resolve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Miller

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME speaker...great sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought for son's birthday present and we all use it regularly. Super clear sound, VERY impressed. Considering buying another to use when he take his. I do recommend if you like sleek design, easy connect ability, easy travel (especially if you get case) and again the sound is nice...and loud if you like it loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, clear and crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: I got the UB2 after reading multiple recommendations from online review. I have to say I was very suprised by how good it reproduces sound. I typically use headphones for music (MrSpeakers Aeon, LCD 2, Atlas, Andromeda, to name some), though the sound from the UE Boom does not rival none of those, I am very satisfied with it as a small casual speaker (it is indeed small, which makes it very easy to carry). There is just enough bass, it's best quality is how clear and crisp it. I very much recommend it (way better than the JBL Charge 3 I used to have).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speaker still lives after being submerged in 2 feet of water for 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 11/17. It’s been through hell with 2-4 year old boys. Recently it was placed in a kiddie pool in two feet of water for 4 hours. Suffice to say I dried it off and it still works. This speaker has fallen anywhere from 6 to 14 feet and still works. I recommend this speaker hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, simple style..good price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I had a friend who purchased it about a year before me and he loved it and said that the performance is great for the price. I would have to agree. It is not only loud but very clear. The bass is very focused and controlled. The mids and highs are really clear. My only thing about the design that I have a little beef with is the plus and minus volume buttons, on the face of the item. They are a little hard to push in. It was super easy to sync with any player once you download the app to your phone to configure everything. I am really considering getting another one later.
customer_reviews.author: T-bone

customer_reviews.title: BOOM-TASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: This is a totally unbiased review: This thing is awesome. Been wanting to buy a bluetooth speaker for a long time, but never had the patience to check them out. Then I saw a review (a few actually) on sites like CNET that recommended this one; they said the original was great/one of the best out there and then they went ahead and made it better. Trusting the site(s), I decided to just get this one and try it out. These types of speakers usually suffer from muffled sound, too much bass, too little bass, etc., etc., but HOLY MOLY! THIS THING ROCKS! The sound is clear, it feels substantial and well constructed. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: G. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Crisp Sound Quality and amazing surround-sound like volume capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bluetooth speaker that I have ever really been just astonished by. Even the default sound it makes when powered on immediately took me by surprise because the crispness and the sheer volume (while not overwhelming) was already so apparent and more impressive than any other speaker for this price ive heard before. It has an aux as well as a charging port on one side and the power and bluetooth buttons on the other. The color of this blue is truly beautiful in person and the quality of the sound is really unmatched to any others I've heard anywhere near this price. Damn good speaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 Hour of Play on Charge! Really?
customer_reviews.text: 1 Hour Play on a Charge! 😖 For this price I expected way better. The sound isn't all that great either. I'm very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not good
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't say certified refurbished but I should have known better that it was too good a deal or if it wasn't, this must be a dud. The product has a whizzing noise coming from it as it's playing music. The first UE Boom is one of my favorite items and so I was excited and ready to get the UE Boom 2. I'm hoping this is just the individual device and not the whole UE Boom 2 unit but unfortunately, this device does not play as good as my original boom bought directly from UE.
customer_reviews.author: ryan2412

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!  Love the sound quality and is super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this boom speaker because my sister has one, and at a recent family event she had music playing though it, and I thought it sounded amazing. I was lucky enough to get it in the midnight blue which I love! I cannot speak to the battery life, as I just got it, but so far I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge at while using with volumes over 75%
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality for the UE Boom is great, and is much improved over older models of UE I’ve had in the past. The only huge problem is that this model won’t charge while listening at a volume at or above 75%. The battery life isn’t great and if you’re using it frequently it pretty much has to remain plugged in. Sad to say I’ll probably look for better speakers in the future
customer_reviews.author: Marcela A.

customer_reviews.title: I need a third
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers, this is my second one and my first one i purchased more than a year ago and still working wonderful. These speakers are completely water proof up and the sound is incredible. I have 2 in my car and its great having professional sounding surround sound with me anywhere i go since you can link them up (up to 50) using the app. The battery also lasts a long time but if you are playing loud music via bluetooth thats the fastest way to kill it. But expect 7-10 hours of play time.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker you can take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bluetooth speaker for its classy design, durability, portability, good sound quality, and battery life. For its size and portability, the sound quality is quite good. My UE Boom replaced a small portable speaker with lots of wires. Just getting rid of all the wires is reason enough to buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence H. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: UE speakers - GREAT SOUND! Great features!
customer_reviews.text: UE speakers are amazing!!! You can't have just one! I keep adding to my collection! The sound is awesome and the Party UP feature allows you to play countless speakers at the same time (well they say up to 150, but I haven't tested anywhere near that number yet....)
customer_reviews.author: Treasure

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece wanted this because a friend had it and well, it got rave reviews in her friend group. Apparently it can withstand, well...everything. Take a beating and keeps ticking (or playing). So, spend the money if you are interested in getting this for a teenager; you'll have a piece of mind not to worry about it breaking after a few uses. Oh, and it kicks out a pretty decent sound!
customer_reviews.author: LeoLizzy24

customer_reviews.title: Great compact loud speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker because friends own them and I have heard their prior to purchase. I use my speaker at the park while playing tennis or volleyball and it really gets loud. I will have to go turn it down depending on what the song is. Battery has lasted 6 trips to the park, about 1.5 hrs per trip, without having to recharge the battery. Overall I give it a 5 star due to its simple compact design, water resistance, and loud clear sound. Great speaker for the customer wanting to invest in a outdoor speaker that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rsims7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: This portable speaker has excellent sound. I've had it for over a year and it still holds a good charge too. I always thought it had really good sound and have always been pleased with the purchase. I recently bought my son a cheaper bluetooth speaker for his birthday and heard how bad the sound is from that one. I would buy this portable speaker again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic. It is extremely portable, has a fantastic connection range, and above all gives a very balanced and full sound. The app that accompanies the speaker is also really cool because it gives you access to an equalizer to control the type of sound you want to produce from the speaker. For something as small as it is, it gives a surprising amount of volume and doesn’t distort at all at its highest volume.
customer_reviews.author: JHandy1414

customer_reviews.title: Updates are horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these and when you try to link them, they constantly fail.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good size, weight, sound, and portability
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn’t work right. My neighbor can take over the speaker any time wants which is irritating. Like the size. It gets just loud enough. Goes about six hours unplugged. Left it outside in the rain all night one night and it was fine. Get the one with usb c charger cuz it’s surprisingly hard to plug in sometimes
customer_reviews.author: R. Anthony Cashin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love it ❗️
customer_reviews.text: My husband is hard of hearing. He uses this speaker on his night table when we are watching tv at night. He is able to turn up the volume so that he can hear the whispers , without blasting me out of the room. I no longer have to repeat what was just said while missing what is currently being said , or , having to pause-repeat-pause, you get it , right ?
customer_reviews.author: Moff

customer_reviews.title: Plus their technical support team was great and helped answer a few questions about how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible speaker... have four of them now and connect them all thru UE app to play from the same play list. Battery life is outstanding at 13 + hours on a charge. Plus their technical support team was great and helped answer a few questions about how to set the four speakers up... Oh and being waterproof, shock proof is great... use them camping and throughout the house... Crystal clear sounds on all types of music.... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech makes a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every cent. The bluetooth syncs almost instantaneously when turning the speaker on, there's practically zero lag/thinking time, and most notable, the bluetooth still works at almost 70 feet away while the speaker is perfectly clear at that 70 ft distance (obviously at a louder volume). This speaker can be LOUD at max volume but still clear, & the speaker will reflect your device's audio settings, meaning if you believe there's a quality issue, change your device's output/equalizer settings. Logitech makes a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still an excellent BT speaker in 2018
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine about 1.5 years ago. I noticed the battery had become defective and would only hold less than an hour's charge. I contacted UE (Logitech) support and was able to get a warranty replacement sent out. Another great Logitech support experience, and I will continue sticking by the company. 5 stars for the product itself and the support if you get the short end of the stick.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Essentially great with a few petty complaints
customer_reviews.text: Mostly it’s great. Sound is great. It’s waterproof. Feels good in the hand. My biggest complaints are... not too big. In no particular order: The max volume indicator sound is obnoxious. All the rest of the utility sounds are great, but max volume is gross. Why? Also, the plug socket is hard to get in. It just wouldn’t work if I’m not concentrating hard on... plugging it in. This shouldn’t be this hard. And finally it’s sometimes iffy on the Bluetooth connection. But mostly just fine. It’s essentially a great product. I bought two. Use one at home and one at work every day.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Van Dinther

customer_reviews.title: Faultless. Amazing. Everyone should have one, just don't sit near me at the pool please :)
customer_reviews.text: We've been very impressed with this speaker, so much so I bought my dad one! Rugged, drop proof, battery lasts for ages, volume goes very loud and sound quality is great. Bluetooth is easy and works well to. And price was good. Faultless really
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love it, kind of hate the app...!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could use the speaker without the app. It's a cool feature tht u can turn it on, turn it up, turn it down and connect it with other speakers. But thts it. The app now supports Android version 5.0 and up. My media player is version 4.1.1 (an oldie but goodie), so i can no longer connect it through bluetooth nor NFC (yes my awesome old media player has nfc). I REALLY hate this because all my music is on there!
customer_reviews.author: silent941

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is great, the sound is clear and the bass is ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound can not be matched by anything else on the market. The battery life is great, the sound is clear and the bass is crisp. This is my second speaker and won't be my last. The shipping was fast and packaged well. The storage case holds the speaker, charging cord and plugs for ports on the speaker. Being able to adjust the volume from the speaker is awesome and it comes in different colors. The battery life is great and should last through your house party. I highly recommend this speaker if you love listening music.
customer_reviews.author: WESLEY D SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this portable speaker over competitors such as the vise soundlink mini. The price I got it for was good and the extra features sold me. I'm happy with it being Waterproof, durable, links me with other speakers, app control, long battery time, good Bluetooth and a good overall sound. It is noticeably louder and bassier than the bose and the sound quality really isn't that much behind. The shape is also a plus because it can fit into cup and bottle holders
customer_reviews.author: bmore

customer_reviews.title: Must buy , you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: absolutely reccomend! found this product online looking for a good bluetooth speaker. have reccomend this speaker to a handful of others and now they own there own version of this speaker. I am a heavy equipment operator, operating a D7 or D9 bulldozer while listening to some Chicago creating retention ponds, wink wink you know who you are!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Gives great sound, easy to use, and battery has lastest longer than i expected. (At least a few hours without recharging with continuous use). Only downside is the material is made of the same plastic as a cell phone, and gets dirty fairly easily and has already become a bit discolored. But the functional use of the speaker is fantastic, so only minor complaint. Purchased the blue and have been using almost daily for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I took it to the beach and it was loud enough to hear without bothering others. Great sound quality, long battery life, and I love that it’s a Bluetooth speaker. I also own a MEGA BOOM and this is a little narrower but this one also has a longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Way better bass overall than the larger, MegaBoom.  MegaBoom Bass died in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I should have kept this speaker. The Megaboom is total garbage. This one didn't blow out the bass driver in 2 months. I'm trying to return the Megaboom. The Boom 2 is far better than the Megaboom. Bigger isn't always better.
customer_reviews.author: Blithmog

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality, battery life, and connectivity options for the size and price. The only thing I wish it had was an ability to change songs from the speaker. There’s only a volume button, power button, and Bluetooth button. Not a deal breaker for me though. I love the ability to turn on the speaker from the UE Boom app and the ability to connect multiple speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great for loud spaces
customer_reviews.text: I work in a very loud warehouse that constantly has a machinery running. I can still hear the sound on this speaker loud and clear. It doesn't attack a lot of dust which is also good. The app that goes with the speaker allows you to control the speaker from your phone as well as toggle with the sound quality. The only con is that the battery life does not last long if you have to play it on the loudest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great all-usage portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this in place of a stereo system in my car (my car is so old it has cassette trays under the stereo!). Also just for listen to music off my iPhone when I'm at home. I write music but I haven't set up my studio monitors since I moved - I just use earphones for mixing. The UE Boom is great for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Knox Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Best customer support
customer_reviews.text: The product overall was fantastic for what I needed it for, music for small gatherings and workouts. However, 8 months in, the battery stopped charging. After contacting the manufacturer's on their website they were able to send me a replacement unit, not of the product listed in this review, but of their newer version the UE Boom 3. The support was nothing short of amazing and I am thankful that I can continue using their product (listening to music as I write this review.) Not only will you get an amazing Bluetooth Speaker with this product, but also the fantastic customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Senday

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and power for portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to get a speaker that puts out quality, room-filling sound, this is a fantastic choice. Speaker sounds equally great regardless of where you're standing, both clear and deep. It also has a lot of power - would definitely be appropriate for use at a social event. Battery life seems strong (ran it for an entire work day without charging). Also has a very quality look and feel (nice surfaces, weight, etc.). Writing review after recent purchase (<2 weeks), so no comments for longevity or drop- and water-proof features.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Dunifon

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: At first this product was great, as of lately I’ve been having a lot of connectivity issues. In addition to this I’ve also had issues with the quality of the sound, not sure what is happening. But I will not be purchasing another Logitech product, this is the second speaker over purschased in the last year and keep having the same issues. No one wants to take accountability for the issues and will not exchange it since it’s been less than a year. I’m not happy with this product, the company and or seller should provide a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I really love this speaker - I use it every day for ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this speaker - I use it every day for very long periods of time. The sound is great - I love the portability of it and the fact that it's waterproof. Looks sleek too anywhere I put it in my home. I was between getting this and a soundbar but the portability sold me. I use it for music both at home and on the road (to the beach/picnics). It has a very full sound and nice bass to it. Packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Ny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker! Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker ! Arrived in perfect condition. Great box. Colourful cable. Easy pairing. Detected by phone almost immediately. Started with Guns 'n' Roses - Sweet Child O'mine...It was night, so couldn't turn up full volume. It sounded seriously loud & in a good way, with very less distortion... Great for parties and blasting your music. Maybe a remote would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Syam

customer_reviews.title: Party up!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Boom 2! I have the Boom, as well. You can pair them or add as many as you want. The app gives you more options, but most everything you need is on the unit. I used to sell these when I worked for Verizon. To demo them I would toss them across the room, and stand on them. They are durable! The water resistance is excellent. They are loud! There is a D-ring so you can put it on a carabiner and clip it on your pack, or take the D-ring out and mount on a tripod. If it gets muddy, scrub it clean. Listen to music while in the shower. It really is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy The Quality and Experience the Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the sound and feel of the product. Connected to my TV and to my IPhone 11 Pro and sounds great. Easy to use and understand. The pictures don’t do it justice. When you get it in your hand it feels solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Will not recognize laptop or iPad
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth speaker easily recognizes my iPhone. It once recognized and connected with my Macbook Pro, but then forgot it and would not recognize it again. And it absolutely will not find my iPad. I've done lots of troubleshooting to no avail. Now I just use it to amplify my phone -- but what a waste of money, my time, and also a disappointment -- in this company Ultimate Ears, and in Amazon (yet again).
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Andrade

customer_reviews.title: The UE BOOM 2 are awesome. Wonderful high quality sound and bass that fill ...
customer_reviews.text: The UE BOOM 2 are awesome. Wonderful high quality sound and bass that fill the room from a small little package. Tons of use and only one charge up so far so battery life is great also. Would buy again if I need another gift to give!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: You can only simultaneously connect&OR Play more than 2 speakers per phone
customer_reviews.text: The sound is unmatched. I ran it under the sink and shower with it! No problems, the Ultimate Ears app lets you have total control over the speaker even being able to update the speakers firmware and change its treble, bass, etc. I HIGHLY recommended and UE Speaker
customer_reviews.author: Benton

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I recommend having charger at hand if you are going to put volume on maximum volume for a long period of time. Speaker is small enough to take anywhere and is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Hamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The UE Boom 2 has a lot going for it. It's a loud compact speaker that withstands a lot of punishment. Connecting to it and controls are fairly simple. I use this speaker every morning while making breakfast and also use it when I go to workout in my garage gym. Some people complain about the battery life but to me, the battery life seems pretty good. My only issue is that the app for this speaker shows the battery life in only 10% increments so it is a little difficult to determine how much battery life you actually have.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Reicis

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound but not as good as I had expected based on reviews. Nice rich bass that provides depth to music is sorely lacking even when I adjust the "equalizer" within the app. Despite that, build quality seems very good. It does an OK job for its intended purpose in my home. Get a case to keep it undamaged and prevent cosmetic wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 starts!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed that I was sent the wrong color but I was really looking for more function then fashion and this piece of equipment does not dissapoint! I really like it! I would five it a 4.5 star rating and the main reason it loses a star is because I got the wrong one and didn't want to go through the hassle of getting the color I ordered. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Very Excellent Music Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this item because the sound is amazing and it's portable. So spending time out by the pool is very enjoyable with your favorite music playing. The only thing slightly negative about this item is the multiply people, in one household, that are linked to this device can interfere with your music. My brother uses this feature to annoy me *eye roll*. The only solution I have found is to ask them kindly to disconnect their bluetooth from the UEBoom, which is bit of a hassle. Also I've notice that on rare occasions that my speakers will disconnect themselves. But overall the quality in which sound and music involved I love it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Small speakers with great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 for gifts so I have no actual experience of what they sound like. But I got them on recommendation from daughter who said the sound quality is great. Reviews are good also. Some people said they prefer Boom 2 to the newer Boom 3
customer_reviews.author: S. Cheshire
